Class LevelLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence.LevelLoader

  • public class LevelLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A class responsible for loading level data from json files.

        Returns:
        a sorted List of Levels

      • invalidLevel

        private boolean invalidLevel(int levelNumber)
        Check the level number is valid.
        Parameters:
        levelNumber - The number of the level (starting from 1)
        Returns:
        True if there is a level that matches the level number given.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getLevelActorPaths

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.util.List<Direction>>> getLevelActorPaths(int levelNumber)
        Get any secondary actor paths for a given level.
        Parameters:
        levelNumber - a Level number
        Returns:
        A map where the key is the Actor code and there is a List of List of Directions, one for each secondary Actor

      • getLevelActorNames

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getLevelActorNames(int levelNumber)
        Get the secondary actor names for a given level.
        Parameters:
        levelNumber - a Level number
        Returns:
        A map where the key is the Actor code and the value is the Actor name

      • getLevelActorPositions

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Position>> getLevelActorPositions(int levelNumber)
        Get the secondary actor positions for a given level.
        Parameters:
        levelNumber - a Level number
        Returns:
        A map where the key is the Actor code and the value is the List of Positions, one for each secondary actor.
